thread.title: Yankees' Tanaka has elbow surgery to remove bone spur
thread.title_full: Yankees' Tanaka has elbow surgery to remove bone spur

title: Yankees' Tanaka has elbow surgery to remove bone spur
text:
> Sports Yankees' Tanaka has elbow surgery to remove bone spur FILE - In this Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015 file photo, New York Yankees pitcher Masahiro Tanaka delivers against the Houston Astros during the first inning of the American League wild card baseball game in New York. Yankees pitcher Masahiro Tanaka has undergone arthroscopic surgery to remove a bone spur from his right elbow, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015. (AP Photo/Julie Jacobson, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
